projectDesc.p: The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.

correction.p: Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

normalization.p: GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Sanskrit texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration (IAST) in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

All characters that were fully equivalent to an IAST-conformant character in the text file contributed have been made to conform to the character list below. Non-conformant characters with additional information including accents, capitalization, and whitespace have been preserved as orig elements inside choice elements with their IAST-conformant equivalent in reg elements for the creation of a plain text. These additional informations will be available only in those transformations of this file that display the original information.

lg.l: arthajño 'rthavibhāvanāṃ prakurute vācā padaiścāmalair duḥkhasyottaraṇāya duḥkhitajane kāruṇyatastanmayaḥ /
dharmasyottamayānadeśitavidheḥ satveṣu tadgāmiṣu śliṣṭāmarthagatiṃ niruttaragataṃ pañcātmikāṃ darśayan //
ghaṭitamiva suvarṇaṃ vārijaṃ vā vibuddhaṃ sukṛtamiva subhojyaṃ bhujyamānaṃ kṣudhārtaiḥ /
vidita iva sulekho ratnapeṭeva muktā vivṛta iha sa dharmaḥ prītimagryāṃ dadhāti //
yathā bimbaṃ bhūṣāprakṛtiguṇavaddarpaṇagataṃ viśiṣṭaṃ prāmodyaṃ janayati nṛṇāṃ darśanavaśāt /
tathā dharmaḥ sūktaprakṛtiguṇayukto 'pi satataṃ vibhaktārthastuṣṭiṃ janayati viśiṣṭāmiha satām //
dharma[rmo] dvayavyavasthā[stho] vyañjanato 'rtho na ca[rthataśca] jñeyaḥ //
upastambhasya kālasya yat hīnaṃ hīnameva tat //
yathākhyānaṃ nārthādbhagavati ca bhāvātigahanāt na dharme 'smiṃsrāso bhavati viduṣāṃ yonivicayāt //

body.p:
śrutaṃ niśrityādau prabhavati manaskāra iha yo
manaskārājñānaṃ prabhavati ca tatvārthaviṣayam /

lg.l: ahaṃ na boddhā na gabhīraboddhā buddhau gabhīraṃ kimatarkagamyam /
kasmād gabhīrārthavidāṃ na mokṣa ityetaduttrāsapadaṃ na yuktam //
hīnādhimuktaḥ sunihīnadhātor hī naiḥ sahāyaiḥ parivāritasya /
śrutānusāreṇa hi buddhimattaṃ labdhvā'śrute yaḥ prakarotyavajñām /
śrute vicitre sati cāprameye śiṣṭe kuto niścayameti mūḍhaḥ //
svākhyātatāṃ ca kṣipati kṣatiṃ ca prāpnoti dharme pratighāvatīva[pratighātameva] //
prāgeva saṃdehagatasya dharme tasmādupekṣaiva varaṃ hyadoṣā //
ratnāni yo hi śaraṇapragato 'tra yāne jñeyaḥ sa eva paramaḥ śaraṇa[ṇaṃ] gatānām /
yasmādādau duṣkara eṣa vyavasāyo duḥsādho 'sau naikasahasrairapi kalpaiḥ /
sarvān sattvāṃstārayituṃ yaḥ pratipanno yano jñāne sarvagate kauśalyayuktaḥ /
yo nirvāṇe saṃsaraṇe 'pyekaraso 'sau [saṃsṛtiśāntyekaraso 'sau] jñeyo dhīmāneṣa hi sarvatraga evam //
sphurati jagadidaṃ kṛpāśayena prathayati cāpratimaṃ mahā[rdhaṃ]dharmam //
prakṛtyā paripuṣṭaṃ ca āśrayaścāśritaṃ ca tat /
gāmbhīryaudāryavāde parahitakaraṇāyodite dīrghadharme ajñātvaivādhimuktirbhavati suvipulā saṃprapattikṣamā ca /
saṃpattiścāvasāne dvayagataparamā yadbhavatyeva teṣāṃ tajjñeyaṃ bodhisattvaprakṛtiguṇavatastatprapuṣṭācca gotrāt //
dharmeṣu ca satveṣu ca tatkṛtyeṣūttame ca buddhatve /
mahārhacittodayavarjitā janāḥ śamaṃ gamiṣyanti vihāya tatsukham //
sukhena duḥkhena ca modate sadā śubhī kṛpāluśca vivardhana, dvayam //
paropaghātena tathāvidhaḥ kathaṃ sa duṣkṛte karmaṇi saṃpravatsyati //
kleśācca duḥkhācca bibheti nāsau saṃpattikāle 'tha vipattikāle //
svakā guṇāḥ sattvahitācca modaḥ saṃcintyajanmarddhivikurvitaṃ ca /
parasya kṛtye samupasthite punaḥ paraiḥ samādāpanato 'tilajjanā //
paratra loko na tathātinirdayaḥ pravartate tāpanakarmaṇāripau /
yathā parārthaṃ bhṛśaduḥkhatāpane kṛpātmakaḥ svātmani saṃpravartate //
tathāgatajñānamanuttaraṃ padaṃ parārtha eṣa tryadhiko daśātmakaḥ //
kṣamā ca dāntā ca sudūragā'kṣayā jinātmajānāṃ pratipattiruttamā //
mahābhaye kāmijanaḥ pravartate cale viparyāsasukhe bhavapriyaḥ /
pratisvamādhipraśame śamapriyaḥ sadā tu sarvādhiga[śa]me kṛpātmakaḥ //
jano vimūḍhaḥ svasukhārthamudyataḥ sadā tadaprāpya paraiti duḥkhatām /
sadā tu dhīro hi parārthamudyato dvayārthamādhāya paraiti nirvṛtim //
yathā yathā hyakṣavicitragocare pravartate cāragato jinātmajaḥ /
akāmakāreṇa hi viprapattayo jane bhavantīti kṛpāvivṛddhitaḥ //
na sanna cāsanna tathā na cānyathā na jāyate vyeti na cāvahīyate /
na vardhate nāpi viśudhyate punarviśudhyate tatparamārthalakṣaṇam //
na cātmadṛṣṭiḥ svayamātmalakṣaṇā na cāpi duḥsaṃsthitatā vilakṣaṇā /
dvayānna cānyad bhrama eṣata[tū]ditastataśca mokṣo bhramamātrasaṃkṣayaḥ //
kathaṃ jano vibhramamātramāśritaḥ paraiti duḥkhaprakṛtiṃ na saṃtatām /
avedako vedaka eva duḥkhito na duḥkhito dharmamayo na tanmayaḥ //
ta cāntaraṃ kiṃcana vidyate 'nayoḥ sadarthavṛttyā śamajanmanoriha /
tathāpi janmakṣayato vidhīyate śamasya lābhaḥ śubhakarmakāriṇām //
saṃbhṛtya saṃbhāramanantapāraṃ jñānasya puṇyasya ca bodhisattvaḥ /
arthānsa vijñāya ca jalpamātrān saṃtiṣṭhate tannibhacittamātre /
nāstīti cittātparametya buddhyā cittasya nāstitvamupaiti tasmāt /
buddhāṃśca sattvāṃśca sa dikṣu gatvā saṃmānayatyānayate viśuddhim //
saṃdarśayatyeva ca tānyatheṣṭaṃ vaśī vicitrairapi sa prakāraiḥ //
śakto bhavatyeva ca satvapāke saṃjātapakṣaḥ śakuniryathaiva /
ṣaḍdhāpyabhijñā trividhā ca vidyā aṣṭau vimokṣā 'bhibhuvastathā'ṣṭau /
sa hi paramavaśitvalabdhabuddhirjagadavaśaṃ svavaśe vidhāya nityam /
rūciḥ prasādaḥ praśamo 'nukampanā kṣamātha medhā prabalatvameva ca /
jinātmaje śāstari saṃprapattaye mataṃ hi samyakparipākalakṣaṇam //
kṛpā prakṛtyā paraduḥkhadarśanaṃ nihīnacittasya ca saṃpravarjanam /
vraṇe 'pi bhojye paripāka iṣyate yathaiva tatsrāvaṇabhogayogyatā /
tathā na mātā na pitā na bandhavaḥ suteṣu bandhuṣvapi suvyavasthitāḥ //
tathājano nātmani vatsalo mataḥ kuto 'pi susnigdhaparāśraye jane /
yathā kṛpātmā parasatvavatsalo hite sukhe caiva niyojanātmataḥ //
na bodhisattvasya śarīrabhogayoḥ pareṣvadeyaṃ punarasti sarvathā /
anugraheṇa dvividhena pācayan paraṃ samairdānaguṇairna tṛpyate //
punaḥ sa yatnaṃ paramaṃ samāśrito na khidyate kalpasahasrakoṭibhiḥ /
jinātmajaḥ sa[ttva]gaṇaṃ prapācayan paraikacittasya śubhasya kāraṇāt //
nihatya sarvāmavamānakāmatāṃ śubhena saṃvardhayate ca taṃ punaḥ //
sa tatvabhāvārthanaye suniścitaḥ karoti satvānsuvinīta saṃśayān /
tataśca te tajjinaśāsanādarād vivardhayante svaparaṃ guṇaiḥ śubhaiḥ //

body.p: iti sugatigatau śubhatraye vā jagadakhilaṃ kṛpayā sa bodhisattvaḥ /

lg.l: kṛtvā duṣkaramadbhutaṃ śramaśataiḥ saṃcityasarvaśubhaṃ kālenottamakalpayānamahatā sarvāvṛtīnāṃ kṣayāt /
sūkṣmasyāvaraṇasya bhūmiṣu gatasyotpāṭanād buddhatā ratnānāmiva sā prabhāvamahatāṃ peṭā samuddhāti[ṭi?]tā //
sarvadharmāśca buddhatvaṃ dharmo naiva na kaścana /
buddhatvaṃ sarvadharmaḥ samuditamatha vā sarvadharmavyapetaṃ prodbhūterdharmaratnapratatasumahato dharmaratnākarābham /
bauddhairdharmairyacca susaṃpūrṇaśarīraṃ yatsaddharme vetti sa sattvānpravinetum /
yātaṃ pāraṃ yatkṛpayā sarvajagatsu tad buddhatvaṃ śreṣṭhamihatyaṃ[heṣṭaṃ] śaraṇānām //
kleśajñeyavṛtīnāṃ satatamanugataṃ bījamutkṛṣṭakālaṃ yasminnastaṃ prayātaṃ bhavati suvipulaiḥ sarvahāniprakāraiḥ /
śamābhirāmaṃ karūṇāyate janamaghā[bhavā]bhirāme 'nyajane tu kā kathā //
yathāmbaraṃ sarvagataṃ sadāmataṃ tathaiva tatsarvagataṃ sadāmatam /
yathāmbaraṃ rūpagaṇeṣu sarvagaṃ tathaiva tatsatvagaṇeṣu sarvagam //
tatha duṣṭeṣu sattveṣu buddhabimbaṃ na dṛśyate //
naśuddhā nāpi cāśuddhā tathatā buddhatā matā //
na bhāvo nāpi cābhāvo buddhatvaṃ tena kathyate /
cittajñāne tathā bauddhe bhāvābhāvo na śasyate //
buddhānāmamale dhātau naikatā bahutā na ca /
sakṛt jñeyaṃ tathā sarvaṃ buddhajñānaiḥ prabhāsyate //
śubhe vṛddho loko vrajati suviśuddhau paramatāṃ śubhe cānārabdhvā vrajati śubhavṛddhau paramatām /
vrajatyevaṃ loko diśi diśi jinānāṃ sukathitair apakvaḥ pakvo vā [na]ca punaraśeṣaṃ dhruvamiha //
tathā kṛtvā caryāṃ [kṛcchrāvāpyāṃ] paramaguṇayogādbhutavartī mahābodhiṃ nityāṃ dhruvamaśaraṇānāṃ ca śaraṇam /
labhante yaddhīrā [diśi diśi] gasadā [sadā]sarvasamayaṃ tadāścaryaṃ loke suvidhacaraṇānnādbhutamapi //
kvaciddharmāñcakaṃ [dharmyaṃ cakraṃ] bahumukhaśatairdarśayati yaḥ kvacijjanmāntardhiṃ kvacidapi vicitrāṃ janacarīm /
kvacitkṛtsnāṃ bodhiṃ kvacidapi ca nirvāṇamasakṛt na ca sthānāttasmādvicalati sa sarvaṃ ca kurute //
na buddhānāmevaṃ bhavati mamapakvo 'yamiti cāprapācyo 'yaṃ dehī api ca adhunāpācyata iti /
vinā saṃskāraṃ tu prapacamupayātyeva janatā śubhairdharmairnityaṃ diśi diśiḥ samantāttrayamukham //
yathāyatnaṃ bhānuḥ pratataviṣadairaṃśavisaraiḥ prapāka[kaṃ] sasyānāṃ diśi [diśi] samantātprakurūte /
tathā dharmārko 'pi praśamavidhidharmāṃśuvisaraiḥ prapākaṃ sasyānāṃ diśi diśi samantātprakurūte //
yathaikasmāddīpādbhavati sumahāndīpanicayo 'prameyo 'saṃkhyeyo na ca sa punareti vyayamataḥ /
tathaikasmād buddhād [pākā]bhavati sumahān paripāka[pāka]nicayo 'prameyo 'saṃkhyeyo na ca punareti[punarupaiti] vyayamataḥ //
yathā toyaistṛptiṃ vrajati na mahāsāgara iva na vṛddhiṃ vā yāti pratataviṣadāmbu praviśanaiḥ /
tathā bauddhau dhātuḥ satatasamitaiḥ śuddhiviśanair natṛptiṃ vṛddhiṃ vā vrajati paramāścaryamiha tat //
samaḥ sūkṣmaśca tacchiṣṭaḥ[cchliṣṭaḥ] kāyaḥ svābhāviko mataḥ /
miśrekakāryāśca mahopabhogyāḥ sadā mahāsatvagaṇasya te hi //
ādiḥ siddhiḥ śaraṇaṃ gotraṃ citte tathaiva cotpādaḥ /
jātā jātā grāhikā grāhyabhūtā mitrādāttā svātmato bhrāntikā ca /
abhrāntānyā āmukhā naiva cānyā ghoṣācārā caiṣikā cekṣikā ca //
yuktā'yuktā saṃbhṛtā'saṃbhṛtā ca gāḍhaṃ viṣṭā dūragā cādhimuktiḥ //
tathā kāmisthātṛsvaparajanakṛtyārthamudite viśeṣo vijñeyaḥ satatamadhimuktayā vividhayā /
mahāyāne tasya vidhivadiha matvā paramatāṃ bhṛśaṃ tasmin dhīraḥ satatamiha tābheva vṛṇuyāt //
yathā puṇyaṃ prasavate pareṣāṃ bhojanaṃ dadat /
na tu svayaṃ sa bhuñjānastathā puṇyamahodayaḥ //
iti vipulagatau mahogha[mahārya]dharme janiya[parijanayan?] sadā matiṃmānmahādhimuktim /
pañcadhā saptadhā caiva parijñā pañcadhā 'sya ca //
yogināṃ hi manaskāra eṣa sarvātmako mataḥ //
tatvaṃ yatsatataṃ dvayena rahitaṃ, bhrānteśca saṃniśrayaḥ śakyaṃ naiva ca sarvathābhilapituṃ yañcāprapañcātmakam /
jñeyaṃ heyamatho viśodhyamamalaṃ yacca prakṛtyā matam yasyākāśasuvarṇavārisadṛśī kleśādviśuddhirmatā //
na khalu jagati tasmādvidyate kiṃcidanyajjagadapi tadaśeṣaṃ tatra saṃmūḍhabuddhi /
na bhāvastatra cābhāvo nābhāvo bhāva eva ca /
na bhāvastatra cābhāvo nābhāvo bhāva eva ca /
dvayaṃ tatra yathā nāsti dvayaṃ caivopalabhyate //
dvayaṃ tatra yathā nāsti dvayaṃ caivopalabhyate //
ṣaṭ ṣaṭ dvau ca punaśca ṣaṭ dvayamatā ekaikaśaśca trayaḥ saṃskārāḥ khalu tatra tatra kathitā buddhairvibuddhottamaiḥ //
abhūtakalpo na bhūto nābhūto 'kalpa eva ca /
na kalpo nāpi cākalpaḥ sarvaṃ jñeyaṃ nirucyate //
lakṣyaṃ ca lakṣaṇaṃ caiva lakṣaṇā ca prabhedataḥ /
yathā nāmārthamarthasya nāmnaḥ prakhyānatā ca yā /
viditvā nairātmyaṃ dvividhamiha dhīmānbhavagataṃ samaṃ tacca jñātvā praviśati sa tatvaṃ grahaṇataḥ /
tatastatra sthānānmanasa iha na khyāti tadapi tadakhyānaṃ muktiḥ parama upalambhasya vigamaḥ //
paśyati hi nāmamātraṃ tatpaśyaṃstacca naiva paśyati bhūyaḥ //
vidyāsthāne pañcavidhe yogamakṛtvā sarvajñatvaṃ naiti kathaṃcitparamāryaḥ /
ityanyeṣāṃ nigrahaṇānugrahaṇāya svājñārthaṃ vā tatra karotyeva sa yogam //
prasādaḥ saṃpratīkṣā ca dānacchandaḥ paratra ca /
akṛte kukṛte lajjā kaukṛtyaṃ viṣaye ratiḥ /
pratiśaraṇamataḥ sadā prajānāṃ bhavati guṇaiḥ sa samudravatprapūrṇaḥ //
prāṇānbhogāṃśca dhīrāḥ pramuditamanasaḥ kṛcchralabdhānasārān satvebhyo duḥkhitebhyaḥ satatamavasṛjantyuccadānaprakāraiḥ /
prāgevodāradharmaṃ hitakaramasakṛtsarvathaiva prajānāṃ kṛcchre naivopalabdhaṃ bhṛśamavasṛjatāṃ vṛddhigaṃ cāvyayaṃ ca //
dharmo naiva ca deśito bhagavatā pratyātmayavedyo yata ākṛṣṭā janatā ca yukta[yukti]vihitairdharmaiḥ svarkī dharmatāṃ /
svaśāntyāsyapuṭe viśuddhivipule sādhāraṇe 'thākṣaye lāleneva kṛpātmabhistvajagaraprakhyaiḥ samāpāditā //
tasmānnaiva nirarthikā bhavati sā yā bhāvanā yogināṃ tasmānnaiva nirarthikā bhavati sā yā deśanā saugatī /
dṛṣṭo 'rthaḥ śrutamātrakādyadi bhavet syādbhāvanāpārthikā aśrutvā yadi bhāvanāmanuviśet syāddeśanāpārthikā //
madhurā madavyapetā na ca khinnā deśanāgrasatvānāṃ /
adīnā madhurā sūktā pratītā viṣadā tathā [vāgjinātmaje] /
śuddhā trimaṇḍalena hiteyaṃ deśanā hi buddhānāṃ /
khedo 'tha matsaritvaṃ doṣā hyete matā kathāyāṃ hi /
sa hi daśavidhamanuśaṃsaṃ labhate satvottamo dhīmān //
kṛtsnāṃ ca dhātupuṣṭiṃ prāmodyaṃ cottamaṃ maraṇakāle /
janma ca yathābhikāmaṃ jātismaratāṃ ca sarvatra //
bhavati sukathiko hi bodhisattvastapati jane kathitairyathaiva sūryaḥ //
suyogo guṇavān deśo yatra dhīmān prapadyate //
na khalu jinasutānāṃ bādhakaṃ duḥkhamugraṃ narakabhavanavāsaiḥ satvahetoḥ kathaṃcit /
śamabhavaguṇadoṣapreritā hīnayāne vividhaśubhavikalpā bādhakā dhīmatāṃ tu //
na khalu narakavāso dhīmatāṃ sarvakālaṃ vimalavipulabodherantarāyaṃ karoti /
yathaiva citre vidhivadvicitrite natonnataṃ nāsti ca dṛśyate 'tha ca /
abhūtakalpe 'pi tathaiva sarvathā dvayaṃ sadā nāsti ca dṛśyate 'the ca //
yathaiva toye luti[ṭi]te prasādite na jāyate sā punaracchatānyataḥ /
malāpakarṣastu sa tatra kevalaḥ svacittaśuddhau vidhireṣa eva hi //
mataṃ ca cittaṃ prakṛtiprabhāsvaraṃ sadā tadāgantukadoṣadūṣitaṃ /
tathāvidhāyaṃ pratigho virudhyate suteṣu tadvatsakṛpe 'pi dehiṣu //
maitrī yataḥ pratighacittamato viruddhaṃ śāntiryato vyasanacittamato viruddhaṃ /
artho yato nikṛticittamato viruddhaṃ lhādo yataḥ pratibhayaṃ na[ca] tato viruddhaṃ //
āture ca yathā vaidyaḥ satveṣu pratipadyate //
pitā yathā sute bāle satvāheṭhe prapadyate //
tataḥ sa tanukāṃ labdhvā praśrabdhiṃ kāyacetasoḥ /
tato 'nuśaṃsān labhate pañca śuddhaiḥ sa pūrvagān /
prapūrau ca viśuddhau ca dharmakāyasya sarvathā /
nirvikalpaṃ malāpetaṃ jñānaṃ sa labhate punaḥ //
labdhvā darśanamārgo hi tadā tena nirūcyate //
prakṛtyā śūnyatāṃ jñātvā śūnyajña iti kathyate //
tena darśanamārgeṇa saha lābhaḥ sadā mataḥ /
sarvārthakartā na ca kārakāṅkṣī yathātmanaḥ svātmahitāni kṛtvā //
yo muktacittaḥ parayā vimuktyā baddhaśca gāḍhāyatabandhanena /
duḥkhasya paryantamapaśyamānaḥ prayujyate caiva karoti caiva //
yatprema yā vatsalatā prayogaḥ satveṣvakhedaśca jinātmajānāṃ /
kathaṃ tathā durlabhadarśane munau bhavenmahārthaṃ na hi nityadarśanaṃ /
a[pra]codyamānaḥ satataṃ ca saṃmukhaṃ tathāgatairdharmasu[mu]khe vyavasthitaḥ /
nigṛhya keśeṣviva doṣagahvarāt nikṛṣya bodhau sa balānniveśyate //
buddhāḥ samyakpraśaṃsāṃ vidadhati satataṃ svārthasamyakprayukte, nindāmīrṣyāprayukte sthitivicayapare cāntarāyānukūlān /
dharmān sarvaprakārānvidhivadiha jinā darśayantyagrasatve, yān varjyāsevya yoge bhavati vipulatā saugate śāsane 'smim //
iti satataśubhācayaprapūrṇaḥ suvipulametya sa cetasaḥ samādhiṃ /
tathaiva dānādiśubhasya sarvato budheṣu karma trividhaṃ nirucyate //
na kāyavāk cittamayasya karmaṇo jinātmajānāṃ bhavatīha saṃnatiḥ //
na karmiṇaḥ karma na karmaṇaḥ kriyāṃ sadāvikalpaḥ samudīkṣate tridhā /
śikṣātrayamadhikṛtya ca ṣaṣṭ pāramitā jinaiḥ samākhyātāḥ /
dānaṃ vipakṣahīnaṃ jñānena gataṃ ca nivikalpena /
śīlaṃ vipakṣahīnaṃ jñānena gataṃ ca nirvikalpena /
vīryaṃ vipakṣahīnaṃ jñānena gataṃ ca nivikalpena /
dhyānaṃ vipakṣahīnaṃ jñānena gataṃ ca nirvikalpena /
prajñā vipakṣahīnā jñānena gatā ca nirvikalpena /
upāyaṃ ca vibhutvaṃ ca sarvāsāmeva kathyate //
dvayorarthaṃ sa kurūte ātmanaśca parasya ca /
yaḥ paraṃ kupitaṃ jñātvā svayaṃ tatropaśāmyati //
dharmāṇāṃ pramukhaṃ teṣu vidyate trividhaśca saḥ /
na ca saktaṃ na ca saktaṃ na ca saktaṃ saktameva na ca dānaṃ /
na ca saktaṃ na ca saktaṃ na ca saktaṃ bodhisattvānām //
na ca saktaṃ na ca saktaṃ na ca saktaṃ saktameva na ca śīlaṃ /
na ca saktaṃ na ca saktaṃ na ca saktaṃ bodhisatvānām //
na ca saktā na ca saktā na ca saktā sattikā na kṣāntiḥ /
na ca saktā na ca saktā na ca saktā bodhisattvānām //
na ca saktaṃ na ca saktaṃ na ca saktaṃ saktameva ca na vīryaṃ /
na ca saktaṃ na ca saktaṃ na ca saktaṃ bodhisattvānām //
na ca saktaṃ na ca saktaṃ na ca saktaṃ saktameva na ca dhyānaṃ /
na ca saktaṃ na ca saktaṃ na ca saktaṃ bodhisattvānām //
na ca saktā na ca saktā na ca saktā saktikā na ca prajñā /
na ca saktā na ca sakta na ca saktā bodhisattvānām //

body.p: tyaktaṃ buddhasutaiḥ svajīvitamapi prāpyārthinaṃ sarvadā kāruṇyātparato na ca pratikṛtirneṣṭaṃ phalaṃ prārthitaṃ /

lg.l: dānenaiva ca tena sarvajanatā bodhitraye ropitā dānaṃ jñānaparigraheṇa ca punarloke 'jñayaṃ sthāpitam //
āttaṃ buddhasutairyamodyamamayaṃ śīlatrayaṃ sarvadā svargo nābhimataḥ sametya ca punaḥ saktirna tatrāhitā /
śīlenaiva ca tena sarvajanatā bodhitraye ropitā śīlaṃ jñānaparigraheṇa ca punarloke 'kṣayaṃ sthāpitam //
kṣāntaṃ buddhasutaiḥ suduṣkaramatho sarvāpakāraṃ nṛṇāṃ na svargārthamasa[śa]ktimato na ca bhayānnaivopakārekṣaṇāt /
kṣāntyānuttarayā ca sarvajanatā bodhitraye ropitā kṣāntirjñānaparigraheṇa ca punarloke 'kṣayā sthāpitā //
vīryaṃ buddhasutaiḥ kṛtaṃ nirūpamaṃ saṃnāhayogātmakaṃ hantuṃ kleśagaṇaṃ svato 'pi parataḥ prāptuṃ ca bodhiṃ parāṃ /
vīryeṇaiva ca tena sarvajanatā bodhitraye ropitā vīryaṃ jñānaparigraheṇa ca punarloke 'kṣayaṃ sthāpitam //
dhyānaṃ buddhasutaiḥ samādhibahulaṃ saṃpāditaṃ sarvathā śreṣṭhairdhyānasukhairvihṛtya kṛpayā hīnāpapattiḥ śritā /
dhyānenaiva ca tena sarvajanatā bodhitraye ropitā dhyānaṃ jñānaparigraheṇa ca punarloke 'kṣayaṃ sthāpitam //
jñātaṃ buddhasutaiḥ satatvamakhilaṃ jñeyaṃ ca yatsarvathā saktirnaiva ca nirvṛtau prajanitā buddhaiḥ[ddheḥ] kutaḥ saṃvṛtau /
jñānenaiva ca tena sarvajanatā bodhitraye ropitā jñānaṃ satvaparigraheṇa punarloke 'kṣayaṃ sthāpitam //
alpasukhaṃ hyātmasukhaṃ līnaṃ parihāṇikaṃ kṣayi samohaṃ /
yadarthamicchanti dhanāni dehinastadeva dhīrā visṛjanti dehiṣu /
śarīrāmevotsṛjato na duḥkhyate yadā manaḥ kā draviṇe 'vare kathā /
tadasya lokottaramiti yanmudaṃ sa tena tattasya taduttaraṃ punaḥ //
sarvāstidānena yatheha dhīmān tuṣṭiṃ vrajatyarthijanasya tuṣṭyā //
suvipulamapi vittaṃ prāpya naivopakāraṃ vigaṇayati tathāthī dāyakāllābhahetoḥ /
svayamapagataśokā dehinaḥ svastharūpā vipulamapi gṛhītvā bhuñjate yasya vittaṃ /
vīryaṃ paraṃ śuklagaṇasya madhye tanniśritastasya yato 'nulābhaḥ /
vīryeṇa sadyaḥ susukho vihāro lokottarā lokagatāṃ ca siddhiḥ //
vīryeṇa satkāyamatītya muktā vīryeṇa bodhiṃ paramāṃ vibuddhāḥ //
tattve praviṣṭaṃ parivartakaṃ ca vīryaṃ mahārthaṃ ca niruktamanyat //
na vīryavān khedaparājito 'sti no vīryavān prāptiparājito 'sti //
sarve ta evaṃ tasmācca vartma tatsatvapācane //
parīttā mahatī pūjā samānāmānikā ca sā /
buddheṣu pūjā paramā svacittāt dharmādhimuktyāśayato vibhutvāt /
satkāralābhaiḥ paricaryayā ca seveta mitraṃ pratipattitaśca /
dharme tathājñāśaya eva dhīmān mitraṃ pragacchetsamaye nataśca //
yānatraye kauśalametya buddhyā svasyaiva yānasya yateta siddhau /
dharmeṣu dāyādaguṇena yukto naivāmiṣeṇa pravesatsa mitram /
saukhyārthini duḥkhārte sukhite kliṣṭe ca te pravartante /
taddeśite ca dharme tattathatāyāṃ ca dhīrāṇām //
te niścalāśca calāśca kṛpaṇairāsvāditā na ca jñeyāḥ /
ete sarve doṣā maitryādiṣu susthitasya na bhavanti /
akliṣṭaḥ saṃsāraṃ satvārthaṃ no ca saṃtyajati //
vijñāya saṃsāragataṃ samagraṃ duḥkhātmakaṃ caiva nirātmakaṃ ca /
nodvegamāyāti na cāpi doṣaiḥ prabādhyate kāruṇiko 'grabuddhiḥ //
duḥkhātmakaṃ lokamavekṣamāṇo duḥkhāyate vetti ca tadyathāvat /
tasyābhyupāyaṃ parivarjane ca na khedamāyatyapi vā kṛpāluḥ //
kṛpā prakṛtyā pratisaṃkhyayā ca pūrvaṃ tadabhyāsavidhānayogāt /
na sā kṛpā yā na samā sadā vā nādhyāśayādvā pratipattito vā /
vairāgyato nānupalambhato vā na bodhisattvo hyakṛpastathā yaḥ //
mūlaṃ karuṇā na bhaved duṣkaracaryāsahiṣṇutā na bhavet /
kaḥ kurvīta na karuṇāṃ satveṣu mahākṛpāguṇakareṣu /
aviṣṭānāṃ kṛpayā na tiṣṭhati manaḥ śame kṛpālūnāṃ /
kuta eva lokasaukhye svajīvite vā bhavetsnehaḥ //
sneho na vidyate 'sau yo 'niravadyo na laukiko yaśca /
uddhartuṃ ya upāyaḥ kathamiva na syātsa niravadyaḥ //
prāgeva tadanyeṣāṃ kathamiva lokottaro na syāt //
kimataḥ paramāścaryaṃ yad duḥkhaṃ saukhyamabhibhavati sarva /
kṛpayā janitaṃ laukyaṃ yena vimukto api kṛtārthaḥ //
kṛpayā sahitaṃ dānaṃ yaddānasukhaṃ karoti dhīrāṇāṃ /
duḥkhamayaṃ saṃsāraṃ yatkṛpayā na tyajati satvārthaṃ /
vardhe ca vardhayāmi ca dāne paripācayāmi sukhayāmi /
duḥkhe duḥkhī kṛpayā sukhānyanādhāya kena sukhitaḥ syāt /
svaṃ dānaṃ kārūṇikaḥ śāstīva sadaiva niḥsvasukhakāmaḥ /
saphalaṃ dānaṃ dattaṃ tanme satveṣu tatsukhasukhena /
phala teṣveva nikāmaṃ yadi me kartavyatā te 'sti //
na hi tatsukhaṃ mataṃ me dāne pāraṃparo 'smi yataḥ //
nanu te tena jñeyaṃ na matphalenārthitā 'syeti //
dānābhirato na syāṃ prāptaṃ cettatphalaṃ na visṛjeyaṃ /
kṣaṇamapi dānena vinā dānābhirato bhavati naiva //
akṛtaṃ na phalasi yasmātpratikārāpekṣayā na me tulyaṃ /
niravadyaṃ śuddhapadaṃ hitāvahaṃ caiva sānurakṣaṃ ca /
sakalaṃ vipulaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ satataṃ muditaṃ nirāmiṣaṃ śuddhaṃ /
na tathopabhogatuṣṭiṃ labhate bhogī yathā parityāgāt /
lajjā vipakṣahīnā jñānena gatā ca nirvikalpena /
hīnāśayā samānā hīnā hi tadanyathā tvadhikā //
ete sarve doṣā himatsu bhavanti no jinasuteṣu /
deveṣu ca manujeṣu ca nityaṃ saṃjāyate ca budhaḥ //
saṃbhārāṃśca sa bodheḥ kṣipraṃ pūrayati lajjayā dhīmān /
satvānāṃ pācanayā na khidyate caiva jinaputraḥ //
ākāśamiva na lipto hrīyuktaḥ jinasuto bhavati dharmaiḥ /
vīryaṃ samādhiḥ prajñā ca satvaṃ dhairyaṃ dhṛtirmatā /
prakṛtyā praṇidhāne ca nirapekṣatva eva ca /
asamā ca tadanyebhyaḥ so 'gre dhṛtimatāṃ yataḥ[mataḥ] //
śamāya prāptaye teṣāṃ dhīmān satyeṣu yujyate /
paryāye lakṣaṇe vākye jñāne jñānācca tā matāḥ //
deśanāyāṃ prayuktasya yasya yena ca deśanā /
dānaṃ śīlaṃ ca puṇyasya prajñā jñānasya saṃbhṛtiḥ /
saṃtatyā bhāvanāmetya bhūyo bhūyaḥ śubhasya hi /
āhāro yaḥ sa saṃbhāro vī[dhī]re sarvārthasādhakaḥ //
manaskārasya ca tyāge praveśe caiva bhūmiṣu //
satvānāṃ paripāke ca abhiṣeke ca dhīmatāṃ //
kṣetrasya ca viśuddhyarthaṃ niṣṭhāgamana eva ca /
parīttā mahatī sā ca mahatī trividhā punaḥ //
cetanā chandasahitā jñānena preritā ca tat /
hetubhūtaṃ ca vijñeyaṃ cittātsadyaḥ phalaṃ ca tat /
prajñaptyastitayā vācyaḥ pudgalo dravyato na tu /
dvaye sati ca vijñānasaṃbhavātpratyayo na saḥ /
ātmopalambhe doṣaśca deśito yata eva ca //
ayatnamokṣaḥ sarveṣāṃ na mokṣaḥ pudgalo 'sti vā //

body.p: prajñaptyastitayā vācyaḥ pudgalo dravyato na tu /

akartṛtvādanityatvātsakṛnnityapravṛttitaḥ /
darśanādiṣu yatnasya svayaṃbhūtvaṃ na yujyate //

tathā sthitasya naṣṭasya prāgabhāvādanityataḥ /
tṛtīyapakṣābhāvācca pratyayatvaṃ na yujyate //

sarve dharmā anātmānaḥ paramārthena śūnyatā /
ātmopalambhe doṣaśca deśito yata eva ca //

saṃkleśe vyavadāne ca avasthācchedabhinnake /
vṛttisaṃtānabhedo hi pudgalenopadarśitaḥ //

yadi cātmadarśanena mokṣa ityasau deśyeta /
evaṃ sati syāt

lg.l: ātmārthaṃ ca na riñcanti parārthaṃ sādhayanti ca //
vīryārambho hyanāsvādo dhāneṣu sukha eva ca /
satvānāṃ pragataḥ sneho yathā satveṣu dhīmatāṃ //
dhyānaṃ ca kuśalaṃ nityaṃ prajñā caivāvikalpikā /
sthāpanā bhājanatve ca śīleṣveva ca ropaṇaṃ /
anarhadeśanāṃ ye ca satvānāṃ gūhayanti hi /
sukhe hite cābhinnā[akheditvādabhinnā] ye sadā sukhahitaiṣiṇaḥ /
asaktyā caiva bhogeṣu śīlasya ca na khaṇḍanaiḥ /
vṛddhiṃ hāniṃ ca kāṅkṣanti satvānāṃ ca prapācanaṃ /
kṣetreṇaṃ nāmnā kālena kalpanāmnā ca tatpunaḥ /
prajñā pāramitānāṃ ca pradhānaṃ dhīmatāṃ matam //
purataḥ sthāpitaṃ yacca nimittaṃ yatsthitaṃ svayaṃ /
tattvaṃ tu bodhisatvānāṃ sarvataḥ khyātyapāsya tat //
paripācyaṃ viśodhyaṃ ca prāpyaṃ yogyaṃ ca pācane /
duḥkhāpaho duḥkhakaro na caiva duḥkhādhivāso na ca duḥkhabhītaḥ /
duḥkhādvimukto na ca duḥkhakalpo duḥkhābhyupetaḥ khalu bodhisattvaḥ //
dharme vaśī dharmanirandhakāro dharmapradhānaḥ khalu bodhisattvaḥ //
saṃpūrṇakāyaśca nidarśane ca śakto 'bhiṣiktaḥ khalu bodhisatvaḥ //
nācchando na ca lubdhahrasvahṛdayo na krodhano nālaso nāmaitrīkarūṇāśayo na kumatiḥ kalpairvikalpairhataḥ /
no vikṣiptamatiḥ sukhairna ca hato duḥkhairna vā [vyā]vartate satyaṃ mitramupāśritaḥ śrutaparaḥ pūjāparaḥ śāstari //

body.p: sarvaṃ puṇyasamuccayaṃ suvipulaṃ kṛtvānyasādhāraṇaṃ saṃbodhau pariṇāmayatyaharaharyo hyuttamopāyavit /

lg.l: jātaḥ svāyatane sadā śubhakaraḥ krīḍatyabhijñāguṇaiḥ sarveṣāmuparisthito guṇanidhirjñeyaḥ sa buddhātmanaḥ //
tīvra utpadyate modo muditā tena kathyate //
jñānena jñeyaṃ vyāptaṃ te muktacitta namo 'stute //
āśraye 'thāśrite deśye vākye jñāne ca deśike /
niḥ sāre caiva satvānāṃ svavavāda namo 'stu te //
mahāyāne ca niryāṇe mārabhañja namo 'stu te //
sarvadā tava sarvajña bhūtārthika namo 'stu te //
